question: Which Ministry has estimated the procurement of rice for 2020-21 to be 495.37 lakh tones?
option3: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution
answer: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution
explanation:
The procurement of Rice for the Kharif Crop Season of year 2020-21 is estimated at 495.37 lakh tonnes.
This estimate has been made by the Ministry of Food and Public Distribution. This estimate is 19.07 % more than the procurement estimates for 2019-20 marketing season. The actual procurement of rice in 2019-20 was the highest at 420.22 lakh tones.
